FuncDef:
The nat centralized-backup manual switchover command configures the manual switchback function for centralized backup of distributed NAT.
By default, the manual switchback function for centralized backup of distributed CGN is disabled.
Examples: Warning: Centralized backup will switchover. Continue? [Y/N]: Y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Centralized CGN providing backup for distributed CGN improves NAT device reliability. After the automatic switchback of centralized CGN providing backup for distributed CGN is disabled and the NAT board on a BRAS recovers, user traffic does not switch back to the NAT board. In this situation, enable the manual switchback function switch traffic to the NAT board for NAT processing.
Prerequisites
Centralized backup of distributed NAT has been enabled.
Precautions
This command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
